text: Below is the list of UNESCO World Heritage Sites in Turkey.UNESCO Official page Name Year (Inscription) Criteria Province Image Göreme National Park and the Rock Sites of Cappadocia 1985 I, III, V, VII Nevşehir Great Mosque and Hospital of Divriği 1985 I,IV Sivas Historic Areas of Istanbul 1985 I,II,III,IV İstanbul Hattusha: the Hittite Capital 1986 I,II,III,IV Çorum Nemrut Dağ 1987 I,III,IV Adıyaman Hierapolis–Pamukkale 1988 III,IV,VII Denizli Xanthos–Letoon 1988 II,III Antalya City of Safranbolu 1994 II,IV,V Karabük Archaeological Site of Troy 1998 II,III,IV Çanakkale Selimiye Mosque and its Social Complex 2011 I,IV Edirne Neolithic Site of Çatalhöyük 2012 III,IV Konya Bursa and Cumalıkızık: the Birth of the Ottoman Empire 2014 I,II,IV,VI Bursa Pergamon and its Multi-Layered Cultural Landscape 2014 I,II,III,IV,VI İzmir Diyarbakır Fortress and Hevsel Gardens Cultural Landscape 2015 IV Diyarbakır Ephesus 2015 III,IV,VI İzmir Archaeological Site of Ani 2016 II,III,IV Kars Aphrodisias 2017 II,III,IV,VI Aydın Göbekli Tepe 2018 I,II,IV Şanlıurfa Arslantepe Mound 2021 III Malatya ==References== ==Other websites== * UNESCO World Heritage Centre - Turkey * Turkey Category:Turkey geography-related lists
title: List of World Heritage Sites in Turkey
